metas.name: My Neighbor Totoro
metas.description: Similar to Spirited Away in its beautiful animation and magical, whimsical fantasy elements centered around childhood wonder.

metas.name: Kiki's Delivery Service
metas.description: Another Studio Ghibli gem with a charming protagonist, magical elements, and a coming-of-age story that fans of Spirited Away will appreciate.

metas.name: Howl's Moving Castle
metas.description: A visually stunning fantasy adventure from Studio Ghibli with a strong female lead and imaginative storytelling.

metas.name: The Secret World of Arrietty
metas.description: Features tiny people living secret lives, similar to the premise of The Borrowers, with beautiful animation and a sense of wonder.

metas.name: Epic
metas.description: An animated adventure where a teenager finds herself in a hidden forest world, offering a similar blend of fantasy and adventure to The Borrowers and Brave.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: A fantastic animated adventure with dragons, friendship, and a coming-of-age story, perfect for fans of Brave and Zootopia.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the thrilling adventures with Hiccup and Toothless, building on the strengths of the first film.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The epic conclusion to the beloved dragon trilogy, full of action, heart, and stunning animation.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: A hilarious and adventurous stop-motion animated film from Aardman Animations, makers of Wallace & Gromit, with a clever plot.

metas.name: Shaun the Sheep Movie
metas.description: Another delightful stop-motion adventure from Aardman, filled with silent comedy and charming characters.

metas.name: Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
metas.description: Fans of Wallace & Gromit's new movie will love this full-length feature filled with their signature wit and invention.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A warm, funny, and charming family comedy about a polite bear with a love for marmalade, akin to the heartwarming feel of some animated musicals.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Even more delightful than the first, this film is a masterclass in family comedy and adventure.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: A unique and hilarious animated adventure about a quirky family saving the world from robots, with a similar modern, comedic feel to Zootopia.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Visually groundbreaking and incredibly fun, this animated adventure blends action and humor in a way that will appeal to fans of Sonic and Zootopia.

metas.name: The Incredibles
metas.description: A fantastic animated superhero adventure with great characters, humor, and action that families will love.

metas.name: The Incredibles 2
metas.description: A worthy sequel that continues the adventures of the Parr family with more excitement and laughs.

metas.name: Despicable Me
metas.description: A fun and funny animated comedy featuring a memorable villain turned hero and his minions, similar to the humor in Kung Fu Panda and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Despicable Me 2
metas.description: Continues the hilarious antics of Gru and the Minions with more adventure and heartwarming moments.

metas.name: Minions
metas.description: A prequel focusing on the beloved yellow creatures, offering pure slapstick comedy and adventure.

metas.name: Hotel Transylvania
metas.description: A fun and silly animated comedy with monsters who are actually quite friendly, offering humor and adventure without being scary.

metas.name: Hotel Transylvania 2
metas.description: More laughs and monster mayhem with Drac and his family as they navigate raising a half-human, half-vampire grandson.

metas.name: Shrek
metas.description: A groundbreaking animated fairy tale parody that's hilarious, adventurous, and appeals to all ages.

metas.name: Shrek 2
metas.description: An even funnier and more engaging sequel with a clever story and fantastic songs.

metas.name: Trolls
metas.description: A vibrant and musical animated adventure filled with catchy songs and positive messages, similar to Sing.

metas.name: Trolls World Tour
metas.description: Continues the musical journey with more fun characters and a global adventure.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: A visually stunning animated musical adventure with a strong heroine, epic journey, and memorable songs, like Tangled and Coco.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: A magical and musical animated film about a family with extraordinary gifts, full of vibrant animation and a heartwarming story.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A charming animated musical adventure set in New Orleans, with a strong female lead and a fairy tale twist.

metas.name: Mulan
metas.description: An inspiring animated adventure about a young woman who disguises herself as a man to save her country, with action and heart.

metas.name: Aladdin
metas.description: A classic animated adventure filled with magic, music, and humor, featuring a genie that kids will love.

metas.name: Toy Story
metas.description: The groundbreaking animated film that started it all, with incredible characters and a heartwarming story of friendship.

metas.name: Toy Story 2
metas.description: An excellent sequel that builds on the original with more emotional depth and exciting adventures.

metas.name: Toy Story 3
metas.description: A poignant and exciting conclusion to the trilogy, full of humor and heartfelt moments.

metas.name: The LEGO Movie
metas.description: A hilariously inventive and action-packed animated adventure that's surprisingly clever and fun for all ages.

metas.name: The LEGO Batman Movie
metas.description: A super-fun and witty animated comedy that spoofs superhero tropes with fantastic LEGO action.

metas.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
metas.description: A charming and stylish stop-motion animated adventure with a clever story and witty dialogue, fitting for fans of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: Raya and the Last Dragon
metas.description: A visually stunning animated fantasy adventure with themes of trust and bravery, reminiscent of the epic scope of Brave and Zootopia.

metas.name: Luca
metas.description: A heartwarming animated adventure about friendship and discovery set in a beautiful Italian seaside town, with a touch of gentle fantasy.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: A hilariously witty and fast-paced animated comedy with a unique sense of humor and great voice acting.
